## Slide with Plot

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)
library(tidyverse)
library(urltools)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
library(skimr)

load("limni2.rda")

limni2 <-  limni %>% 
  filter(territorial %in% c("Taham√≠es"))

limni2$Year <- format(as.Date(limni2$fechas), "%Y")

p <-  ggplot(limni2, mapping = aes(x = Year, y = nivel, 
                                  color = Year)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  facet_wrap(~municipios, scales = "free", nrow = 2)
```

```{r}
p
```
